Much appreciated as always.
Can someone post this as separate mp3s? Not everyone uses windows.

ID3 tags r set in cue files, use "cue-splitter" for mac:
http://www.gritsch-soft.com/_appcuesplitter/cue-splitter_v2.6.zip
and "medieval cue splitter" for windows:
http://www.medieval.it/sw/cuesplitter_setup.exe
till now how many albums released by buddha bar? can anyone let me know it please.
They are 12 albums and every album contains 2 CDs in addition to some CDs lice buudha cafe , nirvana , siddaharta. the whole set could about 10 G.B of musics
